body: I watched this on porn hub when I was younger Damn, knowing that it came from this makes me love this site even more
someone have the english version of this art ?
Its confirmed this is going to have an ova.
This is the Holy Grail of hentai doujins

Forgot to mention, I really hope they never turn this series into an anime. I don't know why, but somehow they manage to fuck up every single hentai anime adaption. So many great hentai manga have gotten really, really shitty anime adaptions recently. For some reason the only decent hentai anime, that I've seen recently, are the one's that aren't based on a manga. No idea why. Maybe getting the rights for a manga takes away so much money from the budget that they don't have enough left to afford good animations
Finally, a "Joshi Luck" Collected Edition. Well, at least for Volume 1 + Bonus. That reminds me, is there already a full release for volume 3?

Like yoleorosa said. DISTANCE has had chapters of "Joshi Luck: 2 Years Later" & other one-shots released bi-monthly in Comic ExE (latest being "Comic ExE 16"). 

This is a re-release of the first "Joshi Luck" tankoubon which also includes bonus chapters & chapters of "Joshi Luck" that where originally released in the "Anekomori" tankoubon.

@Volza-Siriam he never stopped. He has a new chapter on every Comic ExE, including the newest one that was uploaded about a week ago. He even has 2 volumes of the continuation of this series. It's just that nobody gives it the time of day here.
Aftet a long absence of this artist, we got a re-upload, *sigh* wish if they can just resume the latest book
